example.name: autogen1
example.text: In return , he has the government 's blessing to build churches and spread Unificationism in that country .
example.arg: to build churches and spread Unificationism in that country

example.name: autogen2
example.text: he rarely gave his blessing to the claptrap that passes for `` consensus '' in various international institutions
example.arg: to the claptrap that passes for `` consensus '' in various international institutions
